full_description:
Shameem Tropica 7 Gallon Standard Geyser (30 Litre)

The powerful Tropica 7 Gallon Geyser (30 Litre) is designed to run constantly and effectively. With a temperature range of 40 to 80°C, this 7-gallon geyser can be used for a variety of hot water needs. The Tropica 7-gallon water heater puts safety first with a pressure release safety valve set at 125 PSI and safeguards against excessive pressure accumulation. To ensure there are no leaks in the construction, the zinc-coated, rust-proof tank is put through a thorough pressure testing method. To keep the weather out, the 30-liter water heater has an outside jacket constructed of mild steel sheet. A user-friendly, fully automated solution that is 100% safe is the Tropica 7 Gallon Water Heater. Maximum longevity and insulation are provided by Super Glass HP and an inner glass-insulated tank. The Tropica 7 Gallon (30 Liter) Geyser produces hot water with consistency and effectiveness. It boasts a high-precision control, a high-sensitivity thermostat, and a magnesium anode for improved performance against corrosion.

full_description:
Shameem Tropica 7 Gallon Special Geyser (30 Litre)

The Tropica 7 Gallon Special Geyser is a dependable and efficient water heating solution that will meet your everyday hot water requirements. With a large capacity of 7 gallons (30 liters), this geyser can give enough hot water for a variety of residential purposes. Its fully autonomous functioning reduces the trouble of manual operation, allowing you to easily provide hot water on demand. The silver-coated immersion heating element increases durability and provides for faster water heating, and the copper immersion-type combination heating element with thermostat allows for accurate temperature control and economical energy use. The changeable thermostat control, which has a spiral shape and ranges from 30° to 80° Celsius, allows for individual temperature settings. The addition of a temperature and pressure relief valve designed to activate at 125 PSI and 210°F protects against excessive pressure and temperature. A pressure relief valve, often known as a safety valve, adds another layer of protection. Invest in the Tropica 7 Gallon Special Geyser for a safe, energy-efficient, and handy source of hot water. Enjoy the convenience of having hot water whenever you need it, thanks to modern technology and a dedication to quality.

This latest innovation enables speedy and efficient water heating, decreasing waiting time and energy usage. The silver coating also prevents corrosion and increases the lifespan of the heating element, assuring long-term performance. The Tropica 20 Gallon Special Geyser has likewise been built to last. It is built to last and is made of high-quality materials that can withstand the rigors of regular use. This dependability provides homeowners with peace of mind, knowing that their water heating needs will be supplied on a continuous basis, with no surprise failures or malfunctions. Its dependable performance and excellent heating capabilities guarantee that you always have hot water accessible when you need it. This 25-gallon geyser has a temperature adjustment range of 30 to 80°C, making it adjustable for a range of hot water demands. The Tropica 25 Gallon Water Heater is an easy-to-use solution that offers a 100% safety guarantee and is fully automated. Maximum insulation and longevity are provided by an interior tank insulated with glass and Super Glass HP. Maximum longevity and insulation are provided by Super Glass HP and an inner glass-insulated tank. The Tropica 150 Gallon (675 Liter) Geyser produces hot water with consistency and effectiveness. This 675 liter boasts a high-precision control, a high-sensitivity thermostat, and a magnesium anode for improved performance against corrosion.
